nodes.text: Wunka was a male Ewok who fought alongside his brother Tokkat in the Battle of Endor.
Wunka played a crucial part in the battle aiding in the hijacking of an AT-ST. This act changed the tide of battle in favor of the Rebel Alliance. The two brothers survived the battle.

After the battle, he and Tokkat traveled off their homeworld of Endor. The brothers eventually took positions as gunners on the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Liberator. Tokkat and Wunka were present when the Liberator crashed on Coruscant. They bravely defended the surviving crew on the ground.
Wunka was later killed in a Skirmish on Holageus, and Tokkat took his body back to Endor for burial.
While implied, it has never been officially confirmed that the two Ewoks depicted in Dark Empire 1 are Wunka and Tokkat.
A special edition action figure of Wunka was released in August 2012 as part of a K-Mart exclusive 2-pack of Ewok Scouts.
